vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σινά
(-ᾶ, Rec.),
indecl. (but τὸ Σιναῖον, FlJ, Ant., iii, 5, 1; τὸ Σιναῖον ὄρος, ib. ii, 12, 1), τό
(Heb. סִינַי),
Sinai (Exo.19:11, al.): Act.7:30, 38, Gal.4:24-25†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Sinai, "Sin [pagan moon god]; glare [from white chalk]"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Sinai, "Sin [pagan moon god]; glare [from white chalk]"
Mount Sinai, in Arabia, Acts 7:30, 38; Gal. 4:24, 25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西乃 这个專有地名在希伯來文的意思是 "多荊棘的"
在阿拉伯彼特拉伊(Petraea)半島中的一座山或是群山區
因頒摩西律法而出名
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西乃 这个专有地名在希伯来文的意思是 "多荆棘的"
在阿拉伯彼特拉伊(Petraea)半岛中的一座山或是群山区
因颁摩西律法而出名
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Si-na, có lẽ thuộc về Sin, thần mặt trăng. Xem H5514
